(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP We))
    (VP (MD should)
      (VP (VB do)
        (NP (DT a) (NN poll)
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB see)
                (SBAR (IN whether)
                  (S
                    (NP (EX there))
                    (VP (VBP are)
                      (ADVP (RBR more))
                      (NP
                        (NP (NNP Chilli) (NNP Crab) (NNS lovers))
                        (CC or)
                        (NP (NNP Black) (NNP Pepper) (NNP Crab) (NNP lovers))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(do-3, We-1)
aux(do-3, should-2)
root(ROOT-0, do-3)
det(poll-5, a-4)
dobj(do-3, poll-5)
aux(see-7, to-6)
infmod(poll-5, see-7)
mark(are-10, whether-8)
expl(are-10, there-9)
ccomp(see-7, are-10)
advmod(are-10, more-11)
nn(lovers-14, Chilli-12)
nn(lovers-14, Crab-13)
nsubj(are-10, lovers-14)
cc(lovers-14, or-15)
nn(lovers-19, Black-16)
nn(lovers-19, Pepper-17)
nn(lovers-19, Crab-18)
conj(lovers-14, lovers-19)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP think)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (EX there))
          (VP (VBD was)
            (NP
              (NP (CD one) (NN time))
              (SBAR
                (WHADVP (WRB when))
                (S
                  (NP (NNP Chilli) (NNP Crabs))
                  (VP (VBD were)
                    (NP (DT the) (JJ runaway) (NNS favorites))))))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(think-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, think-2)
mark(was-5, that-3)
expl(was-5, there-4)
ccomp(think-2, was-5)
num(time-7, one-6)
nsubj(was-5, time-7)
advmod(favorites-14, when-8)
nn(Crabs-10, Chilli-9)
nsubj(favorites-14, Crabs-10)
cop(favorites-14, were-11)
det(favorites-14, the-12)
amod(favorites-14, runaway-13)
rcmod(time-7, favorites-14)


(ROOT
  (S (CC but)
    (ADVP (RB then))
    (NP (NNP Black) (NNP Pepper) (NNP Crabs))
    (VP
      (VP (VBD came)
        (PP (IN onto)
          (NP (DT the) (NN scene))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VBD stole)
        (NP (JJ top) (NN spot))
        (PP (IN from)
          (NP (NNP Chilli) (NNPS Crabs)))))
    (. .)))


cc(came-6, but-1)
advmod(came-6, then-2)
nn(Crabs-5, Black-3)
nn(Crabs-5, Pepper-4)
nsubj(came-6, Crabs-5)
root(ROOT-0, came-6)
prep(came-6, onto-7)
det(scene-9, the-8)
pobj(onto-7, scene-9)
cc(came-6, and-10)
conj(came-6, stole-11)
amod(spot-13, top-12)
dobj(stole-11, spot-13)
prep(stole-11, from-14)
nn(Crabs-16, Chilli-15)
pobj(from-14, Crabs-16)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN Of)
      (NP (NN course)))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, Of-1)
pobj(Of-1, course-2)


(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (RB nowadays))
    (ADVP (RB there))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (JJ few) (JJ other) (NN crab) (NNS fads))
        (PP (IN like)
          (NP
            (NP (NNP Crab) (NNP Bee) (NNP Hoon))
            (CC and)
            (NP (NNP Salted) (NNP Egg) (NNP Crab))))))
    (, ,)))


advmod(fads-8, nowadays-1)
advmod(fads-8, there-2)
cop(fads-8, are-3)
det(fads-8, a-4)
amod(fads-8, few-5)
amod(fads-8, other-6)
nn(fads-8, crab-7)
root(ROOT-0, fads-8)
prep(fads-8, like-9)
nn(Hoon-12, Crab-10)

cc(Hoon-12, and-13)
nn(Crab-16, Salted-14)
nn(Crab-16, Egg-15)
conj(Hoon-12, Crab-16)


(ROOT
  (S (CC but)
    (NP (PRP I))
    (ADVP (RB still))
    (VP (VBP think)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP
            (NP (NNP Chilli) (NNP Crabs))
            (CC and)
            (NP (NNP Black) (NNP Pepper) (NNP Crabs)))
          (VP (VBP are)
            (ADVP (RB still))
            (PP (IN by))
            (ADVP (RB far)
              (NP (DT the) (NN favorite))
              (PP (IN amongst)
                (NP (NNP Singaporeans))))))))
    (. .)))


cc(think-4, but-1)
nsubj(think-4, I-2)
advmod(think-4, still-3)
root(ROOT-0, think-4)

nn(Crabs-7, Chilli-6)

advmod(are-12, far-15)
det(favorite-17, the-16)
pobj(far-15, favorite-17)
prep(far-15, amongst-18)
pobj(amongst-18, Singaporeans-19)


(ROOT
  (PRN
    (S
      (S
        (NP (NN Today))
        (NP (PRP we))
        (VP (VBP talk)
          (PP (IN about)
            (NP (NNP Black) (NNP Pepper) (NNP Crabs)))))
      (CC and)
      (S
        (PP (IN as)
          (NP (PRP you)))
        (NP (DT all))
        (VP (MD may)
          (ADVP (RB already))
          (VP (VB know)))))
    (, ,)))


tmod(talk-3, Today-1)
nsubj(talk-3, we-2)
root(ROOT-0, talk-3)
prep(talk-3, about-4)
nn(Crabs-7, Black-5)
nn(Crabs-7, Pepper-6)
pobj(about-4, Crabs-7)
cc(talk-3, and-8)
prep(know-14, as-9)
pobj(as-9, you-10)
nsubj(know-14, all-11)
aux(know-14, may-12)
advmod(know-14, already-13)
conj(talk-3, know-14)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT the) (NN creation))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP (DT the) (NN dish))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADVP (RB widely))
      (VP (VBN attributed)
        (PP (TO to)
          (NP (DT the) (JJ famous) (NNP Long) (NNP Beach) (NNP Seafood) (NNP Restaurant)))))
    (. .)))


det(creation-2, the-1)
nsubjpass(attributed-8, creation-2)
prep(creation-2, of-3)
det(dish-5, the-4)
pobj(of-3, dish-5)
auxpass(attributed-8, is-6)
advmod(attributed-8, widely-7)
root(ROOT-0, attributed-8)
prep(attributed-8, to-9)
det(Restaurant-15, the-10)
amod(Restaurant-15, famous-11)
nn(Restaurant-15, Long-12)
nn(Restaurant-15, Beach-13)
nn(Restaurant-15, Seafood-14)
pobj(to-9, Restaurant-15)


(ROOT
  (S (CC But)
    (SBAR (IN if)
      (S
        (NP (PRP you))
        (VP (VBP ask)
          (SBAR
            (WHADVP (WRB where))
            (S
              (VP (VBZ is)
                (NP (DT the) (JJS best))))))))
    (NP (NNP Black))
    (ADVP (RB Pepper))
    (VP (VBZ Crab)
      (PRT (RP around)))
    (, ,)))


cc(Crab-11, But-1)
mark(ask-4, if-2)
nsubj(ask-4, you-3)
advcl(Crab-11, ask-4)
advmod(best-8, where-5)
cop(best-8, is-6)
det(best-8, the-7)
advcl(ask-4, best-8)
nsubj(Crab-11, Black-9)
advmod(Crab-11, Pepper-10)
root(ROOT-0, Crab-11)
prt(Crab-11, around-12)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT a) (NN lot))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP (NNS people))))
    (VP (MD will)
      (VP (VB tell)
        (NP (PRP you))
        (PP (IN about)
          (NP (DT this) (JJ particular) (NN place)))
        (SBAR
          (WHADVP (WRB where))
          (S
            (NP (PRP you))
            (VP (VBP have)
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB ring)
                    (ADVP
                      (ADVP (RB up) (RB early))
                      (PP (IN in)
                        (NP
                          (NP (DT the) (NN day))
                          (PP (TO to)
                            (NP (NN book))))))
                    (NP (PRP$ your) (NNS crabs))
                    (PP (IN before)
                      (S
                        (VP (VBG coming)
                          (PRT (RP down))
                          (PP (IN at)
                            (NP (RB around) (JJ 5pm)
                              (S
                                (VP (TO to)
                                  (VP (VB start)
                                    (S
                                      (VP (VBG queueing)
                                        (PP (IN for)
                                          (NP (DT a) (NN table)))))))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


det(lot-2, a-1)
nsubj(tell-6, lot-2)
prep(lot-2, of-3)
pobj(of-3, people-4)
aux(tell-6, will-5)
root(ROOT-0, tell-6)
dobj(tell-6, you-7)
prep(tell-6, about-8)
det(place-11, this-9)
amod(place-11, particular-10)
pobj(about-8, place-11)
advmod(have-14, where-12)
nsubj(have-14, you-13)
advcl(tell-6, have-14)
aux(ring-16, to-15)
xcomp(have-14, ring-16)
advmod(early-18, up-17)
advmod(ring-16, early-18)
prep(early-18, in-19)
det(day-21, the-20)
pobj(in-19, day-21)
prep(day-21, to-22)
pobj(to-22, book-23)
poss(crabs-25, your-24)
dobj(ring-16, crabs-25)
prep(ring-16, before-26)
pcomp(before-26, coming-27)
prt(coming-27, down-28)
prep(coming-27, at-29)
advmod(5pm-31, around-30)
pobj(at-29, 5pm-31)
aux(start-33, to-32)
dep(5pm-31, start-33)
xcomp(start-33, queueing-34)
prep(queueing-34, for-35)
det(table-37, a-36)
pobj(for-35, table-37)
